newsitem.title: SPAIN: Union Fenosa 9-mth profit up 13.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: Union Fenosa 9-mth profit up 13.5 pct.

text.p: Results for Spanish electricity firm Union Fenosa for the first nine months of 1996 to end of September (in billions of pesetas unless stated)
The company said in a press release that the non-electricity related subsidiaries posted a pretax profit of 2.80 billion pesetas for the first nine months of 1996.
The parent company's ordinary profit rose 52.9 percent in the period due to a sharp reduction in operating and financial costs, Union Fenosa added.

Operating costs fell by 16.08 billion pesetas, or 7.7 percent, from the corresponding period in 1995, while financial costs fell by 10.4 percent due to lower interest rates and a decrease in the company's debt.
